___location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the job should be created

___tags.description: Specifies the tags that will be assigned to the job.

$eref.description: Specifies the job properties

___cancelRequested.description: Indicates whether a request has been submitted to cancel the job.

___incompleteBlobListUri.description: A blob path that points to a block blob containing a list of blob names that were not exported due to insufficient drive space. If all blobs were exported successfully, then this element is not included in the response.

___returnAddress.description: Specifies the return address information for the job.

___returnPackage.description: Contains information about the package being shipped from the Microsoft data center to the customer to return the drives. The format is the same as the deliveryPackage property above. This property is not included if the drives have not yet been returned.

___driveList.description: List of up to ten drives that comprise the job. The drive list is a required element for an import job; it is not specified for export jobs.

___deliveryPackage.description: Contains information about the package being shipped by the customer to the Microsoft data center.

___backupDriveManifest.description: Default value is false. Indicates whether the manifest files on the drives should be copied to block blobs.

___shippingInformation.description: Contains information about the Microsoft datacenter to which the drives should be shipped.

___diagnosticsPath.description: The virtual blob directory to which the copy logs and backups of drive manifest files (if enabled) will be stored.

___logLevel.description: Default value is Error. Indicates whether error logging or verbose logging will be enabled.

___storageAccountId.description: The resource identifier of the storage account where data will be imported to or exported from.

___percentComplete.description: Overall percentage completed for the job.

___export.description: A property containing information about the blobs to be exported for an export job. This property is included for export jobs only.

___provisioningState.description: Specifies the provisioning state of the job.

___returnShipping.description: Specifies the return carrier and customer's account with the carrier.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

_88Export.description: A property containing information about the blobs to be exported for an export job. This property is required for export jobs, but must not be specified for import jobs.

$eref.description: A list of the blobs to be exported.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___blobList.description: A list of the blobs to be exported.

___blobListblobPath.description: The relative URI to the block blob that contains the list of blob paths or blob path prefixes as defined above, beginning with the container name. If the blob is in root container, the URI must begin with $root.

_88Export_blobList.description: A list of the blobs to be exported.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

_88DriveStatus.description: Provides information about the drive's status

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___bytesSucceeded.description: Bytes successfully transferred for the drive.

___copyStatus.description: Detailed status about the data transfer process. This field is not returned in the response until the drive is in the Transferring state.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___errorLogUri.description: A URI that points to the blob containing the error log for the data transfer operation.

___manifestHash.description: The Base16-encoded MD5 hash of the manifest file on the drive.

___manifestFile.description: The relative path of the manifest file on the drive.

___verboseLogUri.description: A URI that points to the blob containing the verbose log for the data transfer operation.

___driveId.description: The drive's hardware serial number, without spaces.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___manifestUri.description: A URI that points to the blob containing the drive manifest file.

___bitLockerKey.description: The BitLocker key used to encrypt the drive.

_88ShippingInformation.description: Contains information about the Microsoft datacenter to which the drives should be shipped.

___streetAddress2.description: The second line of the street address to use when returning the drives.

___phone.description: Phone number of the recipient of the returned drives.

___countryOrRegion.description: The country or region to use when returning the drives.

___stateOrProvince.description: The state or province to use when returning the drives.

___recipientName.description: The name of the recipient who will receive the hard drives when they are returned.

___postalCode.description: The postal code to use when returning the drives.

___city.description: The city name to use when returning the drives.

___streetAddress1.description: The first line of the street address to use when returning the drives.
